name: Butterscotch Reserve RY4
description: Smooth and a little sweet RY4 recipe based off of Glas Basix Butterscotch Reserve. The RY4 is very much forward and blends well with the butterscotch. My first attempt at an RY4 recipe.
author: Daytimefrank1

reviews.text:
How many of us look at reviews of Recipes and find that information useful??  I know I do.  Frustrating that this recipe has over 1000 mixes and until now there was not a single review.  
DaytimeFrank this is tasty.  I toned the sweetener and its right up my alley.  Mix us up another RY4 recipe.  I'll take another!
